ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl r dta_r l pre_r.
exceptions.exn: Abstracting over the terms "d", "la" and "tl" leads to a term fun (d0 : preDTA) (la0 : prec_list) (tl0 : term_list) => forall r0 : reconnaissance d0 a hd, dta_reconnait d0 a hd r0 -> pre_reconnait d0 la0 tl0 l -> pre_reconnait d0 (prec_cons a la0 ls) (tcons hd tl0) (rec_consi d0 a la0 ls hd tl0 r0 l) which is ill-typed. Reason is: Illegal application: The term "pre_reconnait" of type "forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait d p t -> Prop" cannot be applied to the terms "d0" : "preDTA" "la0" : "prec_list" "tl0" : "term_list" "l" : "liste_reconnait d la tl" The 4th term has type "liste_reconnait d la tl" which should be coercible to "liste_reconnait d0 la0 tl0".

original: intros d a la ls hd tl r dta_r l pre_r. induction l. - intros. inversion pre_r. - intros. inversion pre_r; subst; constructor; auto.
